name: DicePathDuelist
description:
An old alchemist decided to turn his skull decoration into a walking chest for his dice. As chaotic neutral alchemists tend to do, he didn't clean up after his Frankenstein magic. A few of his potion bottles also came to live while he was dreaming of sandwiches that night.

You are the newly risen skull equipped with a hand full of dice. And as the loyal companion you are you try to defeat the potions that have gone wild.

  • Choose your path for combat wiseley
  • Find out what the skulls special attack is
  • Defeat the master potion and its footpotions
  • Be sure to keep some teeth
  • Make your sleeping creator proud
  • EVERYTHING made in 48h for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam

A gamejam game by Tobias Heukäufer and Tabea Martin :)
